languages.text: "Партия в регицид выигрывается не последним ходом, а спланированной партией". {n}Вы едва слышите дознавателя, недовольно оглядывающего тоннели.{/n} "И вся эта операция... таковой не является".

"A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."
languages.original_text: "Партия в регицид выигрывается не последним ходом, а спланированной партией". {n}Вы едва слышите дознавателя, недовольно оглядывающего тоннели.{/n} "И вся эта операция... таковой не является".

traits.locale_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「事前の戦略もなしに、最終局面でレジサイドのゲームには勝てませんよ」{n}ハインリックスのかろうじて聞き取れる声で不満げにつぶやく。{/n}「この作戦全体が…その逆を行っている」
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: 「事前の戦略もなしに、最終局面でレジサイドのゲームには勝てませんよ」{n}ハインリックスのかろうじて聞き取れる声で不満げにつぶやく。{/n}「この作戦全体が…その逆を行っている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “弑君棋不是靠最后一步赢的，之前的每一步都要提前规划好。”{n}海因里希一边检查着隧道，一边用你几乎听不清的声音不满地咕哝着。{/n}“而这整个行动……都与获胜的战略背道而驰。”
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: “弑君棋不是靠最后一步赢的，之前的每一步都要提前规划好。”{n}海因里希一边检查着隧道，一边用你几乎听不清的声音不满地咕哝着。{/n}“而这整个行动……都与获胜的战略背道而驰。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas le dernier coup qui décide de l'issue d'une partie de régicide, mais une stratégie élaborée à l'avance. » {n}Vous entendez à peine Heinrix marmonner sur un ton mécontent tout en examinant les tunnels.{/n} « Cette opération... est tout le contraire. »
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas le dernier coup qui décide de l'issue d'une partie de régicide, mais une stratégie élaborée à l'avance. » {n}Vous entendez à peine Heinrix marmonner sur un ton mécontent tout en examinant les tunnels.{/n} « Cette opération... est tout le contraire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Una partida de regicidio no se gana en el último movimiento, sino que se ha de planear con sumo detenimiento». {n}Apenas se oye el murmullo contrariado de Heinrix mientras inspecciona los túneles.{/n} «Esta operación, en cambio... es justo lo contrario».
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: «Una partida de regicidio no se gana en el último movimiento, sino que se ha de planear con sumo detenimiento». {n}Apenas se oye el murmullo contrariado de Heinrix mientras inspecciona los túneles.{/n} «Esta operación, en cambio... es justo lo contrario».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Einen Königsmord begeht man nicht mit dem letzten Schritt, sondern mit sorgfältiger Planung im Vorfeld." {n}Du kannst Heinrixs verdrossenes Murmeln kaum hören, während er die Tunnel inspiziert.{/n} "Diese ganze Operation ... ist das genaue Gegenteil."
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: "Einen Königsmord begeht man nicht mit dem letzten Schritt, sondern mit sorgfältiger Planung im Vorfeld." {n}Du kannst Heinrixs verdrossenes Murmeln kaum hören, während er die Tunnel inspiziert.{/n} "Diese ganze Operation ... ist das genaue Gegenteil."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kral katili; öyle son hamlelerle değil, adam akıllı stratejiyle kazanılır." {n}Tünellere bakan Heinrix'in hoşnutsuz mırıltılarını belli belirsiz duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bu operasyon da... Dediklerimin tam zıttı."
languages.original_text: "A game of regicide is not won on the final move, but with a strategy planned in advance." {n}You can barely hear Heinrix's disgruntled muttering as he surveys the tunnels.{/n} "This whole operation... is the opposite of that."

traits.locale_text: "Kral katili, öyle son hamlelerle değil, adam akıllı stratejiyle kazanılır." {n}Tünellere bakan Heinrix'in hoşnutsuz mırıltılarını belli belirsiz duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bu operasyon da... Onun tam zıttı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
